author: djencks
msg: AMQ-2094 Apply patch to allow binding to specific IP address

author: rjung
msg: Make writing of the "OK" refresh page in status worker
a separate function. Do not generate the page, in case
any error occured, so that the user can read the error
and must "commit" it by navigating back to the status

author: duncf
msg: Bug 6012: Improve reuse logic to better simulate rule hits. This moves
the reuse logic to a plugin and adds several plugin hooks.

author: wjaniszewski
msg: Epmd starts automatically - if epmd is not available tests are beeing ignored. Normalized service/reference RPC, added some error handling.
